verses.verse: <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> a<WG243> mighty<WG2478> angel<WG32> coming down<WG2597> out<WG1537> of the sky,<WG3772> clothed<WG4016> with a cloud.<WG3507> <WG2532> A rainbow<WG2463> was on<WG1909> his<WG846> head.<WG2776> <WG2532> His<WG846> face<WG4383> was like<WG5613> the sun,<WG2246> and<WG2532> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> like<WG5613> pillars<WG4769> of fire.<WG4442>

<WG2532> He had<WG2192> in<WG1722> his<WG846> hand<WG5495> a little open<WG455> book.<WG974> <WG2532> He set<WG5087> his<WG846> right<WG1188> foot<WG4228> on<WG1909> the sea,<WG2281> and<WG1161> his left<WG2176> on<WG1909> the land.<WG1093>

<WG2532> He cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> as<WG5618> a lion<WG3023> roars.<WG3455> <WG2532> When<WG3753> he cried,<WG2896> the seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> uttered<WG2980> their<WG1438> voices.<WG5456>

<WG2532> When<WG3753> the seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> sounded,<WG2980> <WG1438> <WG5456> I was about<WG3195> to write;<WG1125> but<WG2532> I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> from<WG1537> the sky<WG3772> saying,<WG3004> <WG3427> "Seal up<WG4972> the things which<WG3739> the seven<WG2033> thunders<WG1027> said,<WG2980> and<WG2532> don't<WG3361> write<WG1125> them.<WG5023>"

<WG2532> The angel<WG32> whom<WG3739> I saw<WG1492> standing<WG2476> on<WG1909> the sea<WG2281> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> the land<WG1093> lifted up<WG142> his<WG846> right hand<WG5495> to<WG1519> the sky,<WG3772>

and<WG2532> swore<WG3660> by<WG1722> him who<WG3739> lives<WG2198> <WG1519> forever<WG165> and ever,<WG165> who<WG3739> created<WG2936> heaven<WG3772> and<WG2532> the things that are in<WG1722> it,<WG846> the earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> the things that are in<WG1722> it,<WG846> and<WG2532> the sea<WG2281> and<WG2532> the things that are in<WG1722> it,<WG846> that<WG3754> there will no<WG3756> longer<WG2089> be<WG2071> delay,<WG5550>

but<WG235> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of the voice<WG5456> of the seventh<WG1442> angel,<WG32> when<WG3752> he is about<WG3195> to sound,<WG4537> then<WG2532> the mystery<WG3466> of God<WG2316> is finished,<WG5055> as<WG5613> he declared<WG2097> to his<WG1438> servants,<WG1401> the prophets.<WG4396>

<WG2532> The voice<WG5456> which<WG3739> I heard<WG191> from<WG1537> heaven,<WG3772> again<WG3825> speaking<WG2980> with<WG3326> me,<WG1700> <WG3825> <WG2532> said,<WG3004> "Go,<WG5217> take<WG2983> the book<WG974> which<WG3588> is open<WG455> in<WG1722> the hand<WG5495> of the angel<WG32> who<WG3588> stands<WG2476> on the sea<WG2281> and<WG2532> on<WG1909> the land.<WG1093>"

<WG2532> I went<WG565> to<WG4314> the angel,<WG32> telling<WG3004> him<WG846> to give<WG1325> me<WG3427> the little book.<WG974> <WG2532> He said<WG3004> to me,<WG3427> "Take<WG2983> it,<WG2532> and eat<WG2719> it<WG846> up.<WG2719> <WG2532> It will make<WG4087> your<WG4675> stomach<WG2836> bitter,<WG4087> but<WG235> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> mouth<WG4750> it will be<WG2071> as sweet<WG1099> as<WG5613> honey.<WG3192>"

<WG2532> I took<WG2983> the little book<WG974> out<WG1537> of the angel<WG32>'s hand,<WG5495> and<WG2532> ate<WG2719> it<WG846> up.<WG2719> It was<WG2258> as<WG5613> sweet<WG1099> as<WG3753> honey<WG3192> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> mouth.<WG4750> When<WG3753> I had eaten<WG5315> it,<WG846> my<WG3450> stomach<WG2836> was made bitter.<WG4087>

<WG2532> They told<WG3004> me,<WG3427> "You<WG4571> must<WG1163> prophesy<WG4395> again<WG3825> over<WG1909> many<WG4183> peoples,<WG2992> <WG2532> nations,<WG1484> <WG2532> languages,<WG1100> and<WG2532> kings.<WG935>"
